channel.title: Need help with a question on my rs P server
channel.description: Well, I've been using my private server for awhile and got pretty good with it, but i can't quite seem to figure out how to change what NPC's say. if someone could give me a TUT or a Link to a TUT it would help alot, thanks Ii 1337 iI

item.title: Need help with a question on my rs P server
item.dc:creator: @459_expert 459 expert
item.description:
@459_expert wrote:

don’t listen to souleroo…search for what they in npchandler.java, and change what they say.
Save>Compile>Run

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a question on my rs P server

if the npc’s are allredy saying something then search for what they say in client.java txt filen and then just edit it… if errors then ask

item.title: Need help with a question on my rs P server
item.dc:creator: @Ii_1337_iI Ii 1337 iI
item.description:
@Ii_1337_iI wrote:

thank you very much this will help me out. ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2007, 01:31:07 AM[/size][hr]i searched for moo and nothing came up…?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2007, 01:32:47 AM[/size][hr]i still need help i searched “moo” and i didnt find anything…

item.source: Need help with a question on my rs P server

item.title: Need help with a question on my rs P server
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

go into npchandler.java and search for moo

under that add

if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHATTOSAY"; } }

change the #'s to the npc’s id and change “whattosay” to whatever you want the npc to say

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a question on my rs P server
